questions.explanation: This question tests knowledge of cell structure. Each correct structural feature earns one mark.

questions.question: Calculate the magnification of a cell image if the real width of the cell is 0.002mm and the image width is 20mm.
answer: 1. Correct formula: magnification = image size ÷ real size (1)
2. Convert units to same scale: 0.002mm = 0.002mm (no conversion needed) (1)
questions.explanation: This mathematical skills question requires using the magnification formula and handling units correctly.

questions.question: Explain how oxygen moves from the alveoli into the blood.
answer: 2. From high concentration in alveoli to low concentration in blood (1)
